ingredients: chicken, rice, onion, garlic, soy sauce
cooking_instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Cook chicken with onion and garlic. 3. Combine cooked rice and chicken. 4. Add soy sauce.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, ground beef, onion, garlic
cooking_instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Cook ground beef with onion and garlic. 3. Combine cooked pasta, beef, and tomato sauce.

ingredients: salmon, lemon, dill, olive oil, chicken, rice
cooking_instructions: 1. Season salmon with lemon and dill. 2. Grill the salmon. 3. Drizzle with olive oil.
